public abstract class BaseFeatureExtractorTest<T>
extends org.apache.lucene.util.LuceneTestCase
This class will contain setup and teardown code for testing feature extractors

    • assertFeatureValues

      protected void assertFeatureValues​(float[] expected, java.lang.String queryText, java.util.List<java.lang.String> docTexts, FeatureExtractors extractors, int docToExtract) throws java.io.IOException
      Used to test features involving multiple documents in the collection at the same time
      Parameters:
      expected - An array of expected values for the computed features
      queryText - Query
      docTexts - A list of document texts representing documents in the collection
      extractors - The chain of feature extractors to use
      docToExtract - Index of the document we want to compute features for
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
